# Installation

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(maftools)
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(maps)
library(plotly)
library(mclust)
library(here)
```

```{r}
cohort_maf   <- maftools::merge_mafs(paste0(getwd(), "/" , "mafs/",  list.files("mafs/")))
maftools::inferHeterogeneity(cohort_maf)
```
